ISSUE.TITLE: The cookie notification bar is too small
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.5.0.0 Steps to reproduce the problem: Step 1: Start Nop.Web Step 2: Wait for the cookie notification bar to pop up Description: The cookie notification bar is too small for German text. Fix: one possible fix would be to set the height of .eu-cookie-bar-notification to "auto" instead of "180px" `.eu-cookie-bar-notification { position: fixed; top: 50%; left: 50%; z-index: 1050; width: 320px; height: 180px; margin: -90px 0 0 -160px; border: 1px solid #ccc; box-shadow: 0 0 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.15); background-color: #fff; padding: 20px; text-align: center;` ![cookie_bug](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29491358/163848610-9855b034-dfc0-4c38-8d4c-95cb18fad2f7.png)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Sendinblue plugin. Update package to 3.3. Add Marketing Automation directly to the plugin.
